body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lydia Perry. Father of William Perry, Lewis Perry, Lucy J. Perry, John Perry, Sarah C. Perry, Thornton Perry, Presly Perry, and Benjamin Perry. Farmer in Anderson County in 1850 and 1860.
